radiographic_examinations.findings: Very minimal bibasilar atelectasis. No focal consolidation or pleural effusion. A 2.0 x 1.8 x 1.5 cm area of hypodensity in the lateral left lobe of the liver. An additional 0.8 cm hypodensity in the left lobe. Gallbladder mildly distended. Extensive sigmoid and descending colon diverticulosis with focal wall thickening near the proximal sigmoid/very distal descending colon. Possible microperforation indicated by adjacent stranding and a small focus of extraluminal gas.
